items.title: Holesky fork post-mortem and participation drop
items.summary: The Fusaka Holesky fork completed recently; participation rates dropped from 95% to about 75% due to underpowered or over-provisioned supernodes and increased validator duties.

items.title: Client behavior at fork boundary
items.summary: Teams confirmed clients switch at the fork boundary as expected, with no major inconsistencies reported.

items.title: Relay and builder unavailability on Holesky
items.summary: Builders and relays are currently not functioning on Holesky, though they are expected to work properly on Sepolia and Hoodi.

items.title: Holesky end-of-life and maintenance needs
items.summary: Holesky is scheduled for end-of-life at the end of the month; teams observed nodes running out of disk space and will conduct maintenance to recover affected nodes.

action_items.what: Perform node maintenance to address disk exhaustion

items.title: Blob spammer update for new blob limits
items.summary: The blob spammer will be modified to support updated blob limits in ongoing tests.

action_items.what: Update blob spammer to reflect new blob limits

items.title: Client fuzz testing active
items.summary: Fuzz testing continues under the EF testing initiative to validate client behavior under new conditions.

items.title: Execution API updates
items.summary: Execution API PR #691 was highlighted as relevant to current testing efforts.

items.title: BAL devnet 0 progress
items.summary: Links shared for BAL devnet 0 tracking; teams requested that BAL branches be hosted in main client repositories for easier discovery.

action_items.what: Publish bal-devnet-0 branches in main repos

items.title: ePBS devnet coordination
items.summary: The same main-repo branch rule will apply to epbs-devnet-0; an upcoming ePBS breakout call agenda was shared along with the devnet 0 notes link.

items.title: ePBS devnet 0 beta and follow-up
items.summary: ePBS devnet 0 entered beta phase; following the upcoming payments decision, additional spec updates may occur.
